name: This is where the short name which SMILER will use to refer to the model is specified
long_name: This is where the full model name is given
version: This specifies the model version within SMILER
citation: This provides citation information for the model

model_parameter.description: A description of what this parameter does goes here.
model_parameter.valid_values: Either the set of values which the parameter can take or a valid range is specified here.
